mdes.slick.animation.entity.renderable
Interface RenderableAlpha

All Superinterfaces:
AlphaEntity, org.newdawn.slick.Renderable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AnimationAlpha, ImageAlpha
public interface RenderableAlpha
extends org.newdawn.slick.Renderable, AlphaEntity

A Slick Renderable that supports alpha change and animation. This class is provided for convenience, along with AnimationAlpha and ImageAlpha. Using RenderableAlpha means that an AlphaFx can be applied to any alpha renderable, in most cases an Image or an Animation.

Author:
davedes

Methods inherited from interface org.newdawn.slick.Renderable
draw
 
Methods inherited from interface mdes.slick.animation.entity.AlphaEntity
